name: Scorched Kubb
description:
Made at IGI Community Game Jam 2017 over a weekend

Destroy your opponents kubbs with the your amazingly/horribly designed polar opposite guns.

Turn based VR turret battle where players modify their guns and affect their opponent's guns in the opposite way

Jóhannes Gunnar Þorsteinsson
Owen Hindley
Pétur Darri Pétursson
